notes: All prices in CHF for Sweden Central region. Includes Global (cheapest), EU Data Zone (+10%), and Sweden Regional (+20%) deployments. Audio and LLM prices are per MILLION tokens. Only REALTIME models included for live voice calls.

blob_storage.note: Hot tier for frequently accessed manual pages. Shared by both voice and email agents.

acs.note: ACS pricing for Swiss geographic numbers and call handling

container_apps.note: Container costs: active rate during calls, flat idle rate (0.0000024) for BOTH vCPU+memory when min replicas > 0

audio_conversion.note: 2000 tokens per minute of audio. 40% customer talking (input), 60% AI responding (output)

gpt_realtime_mini_global.name: GPT-realtime-mini Global (Recommended - Cheapest)
gpt_realtime_mini_global.note: BEST VALUE. Realtime voice calls with image support. Global deployment (cheapest). Audio: 2000 tokens/min.

gpt_realtime_global.name: GPT-realtime Global (Best quality)
gpt_realtime_global.note: PREMIUM MODEL. Realtime voice calls with image support. Global deployment only. Audio: 2000 tokens/min.

gpt_4o_mini_realtime_global.name: GPT-4o Mini Realtime Global (Fast & economical)
gpt_4o_mini_realtime_global.note: GPT-4o Mini Realtime Preview 2024-12-17. Similar pricing to gpt_realtime_mini. Global deployment.

gpt_4o_mini_realtime_eu.name: GPT-4o Mini Realtime EU (Data stays in EU)
gpt_4o_mini_realtime_eu.note: GPT-4o Mini Realtime Preview 2024-12-17. EU Data Zone deployment. ~10% more expensive than Global but data stays in EU.

gpt_4o_mini_realtime_regional.name: GPT-4o Mini Realtime Regional (Sweden - Lowest latency)
gpt_4o_mini_realtime_regional.note: GPT-4o Mini Realtime Preview 2024-12-17. Sweden Regional deployment. ~21% more expensive than Global but lowest latency and data stays in Sweden.

gpt_4o_realtime_global.name: GPT-4o Realtime Global (Better quality)
gpt_4o_realtime_global.note: GPT-4o Realtime Preview 2024-12-17. Higher quality than mini. Global deployment.

gpt_4o_realtime_eu.name: GPT-4o Realtime EU (Better quality, data in EU)
gpt_4o_realtime_eu.note: GPT-4o Realtime Preview 2024-12-17. EU Data Zone deployment. ~10% more expensive than Global but data stays in EU.

gpt_4o_realtime_regional.name: GPT-4o Realtime Regional (Better quality, Sweden)
gpt_4o_realtime_regional.note: GPT-4o Realtime Preview 2024-12-17. Sweden Regional deployment. ~21% more expensive than Global but lowest latency and data stays in Sweden.

microsoft_365.note: Not counted as new cost if already owned by organization. Price confirmed from Azure pricing doc.

azure_functions.note: Consumption plan pricing. Generous free tier covers most small/medium deployments.

gpt_5_mini_global.name: GPT-5-mini Global (Recommended - Cheapest)
gpt_5_mini_global.note: BEST VALUE for email processing. Excellent quality, lowest cost. Global deployment.

gpt_5_mini_eu.name: GPT-5-mini EU (Data stays in EU)
gpt_5_mini_eu.note: Best value for email processing. ~10% more expensive than Global but data stays in EU.

gpt_5_global.name: GPT-5 Global (Best quality)
gpt_5_global.note: PREMIUM MODEL. Use for complex technical emails requiring highest accuracy. Global deployment.

gpt_5_eu.name: GPT-5 EU (Best quality, data in EU)
gpt_5_eu.note: Premium model. ~10% more expensive than Global but data stays in EU.

gpt_4o_global.name: GPT-4o Global (Legacy - Good quality)
gpt_4o_global.note: Previous generation (Nov 2024). GPT-5-mini offers better value. Global deployment.

gpt_4o_eu.name: GPT-4o EU (Legacy - Good quality, data in EU)
gpt_4o_eu.note: Previous generation (Nov 2024). GPT-5-mini offers better value. EU Data Zone deployment.

gpt_4o_regional.name: GPT-4o Regional (Legacy - Good quality, Sweden)
gpt_4o_regional.note: Previous generation (Nov 2024). GPT-5-mini offers better value. Sweden Regional deployment.

gpt_4o_mini_global.name: GPT-4o-mini Global (Legacy - Economical)
gpt_4o_mini_global.note: Previous generation (Jul 2024). GPT-5-mini is newer and recommended. Global deployment.

gpt_4o_mini_eu.name: GPT-4o-mini EU (Legacy - Economical, data in EU)
gpt_4o_mini_eu.note: Previous generation (Jul 2024). GPT-5-mini is newer and recommended. EU Data Zone deployment.

gpt_4o_mini_regional.name: GPT-4o-mini Regional (Legacy - Economical, Sweden)
gpt_4o_mini_regional.note: Previous generation (Jul 2024). GPT-5-mini is newer and recommended. Sweden Regional deployment.

tokens.note: Base = email content + system prompt. RAG adds retrieved manual context (~1,125 words â‰ˆ 2-3 pages). Output = AI response.

operating_hours.note: Email agent already polls during business hours only. This reduces execution count by 68% but stays within free tier (no cost impact).
